title: BLUE RIDGE Knives Zancudo Black/Stonewash Framelock Folder
description: Designed by ESEE Knives Randall's Adventure and Training School of Survival. The word Zancudo is Spanish for Mosquito. The Zancudo is a 4" frame lock tactical folder. Model R1 features a 3" AUS-8A stainless blade with a Stonewash finish. Black G-10 front handle with a Stonewash stainless back. Includes a lanyard hole and Stonewash stainless pocket clip. These Zancudo folders are not manufactured by ESEE, nor do they carry the ESEE logo. The round Randall's Adventure & Training logo was licensed to Blue Ridge for use on these knives. This folder is designed and fully endorsed by Mike Perrin and Jeff Randall. ESEE does not warranty, market or sell these folders. For warranty information contact Blue Ridge Knives.
